div.class: vc_general vc_tta vc_tta-accordion vc_tta-color-thegem vc_tta-style-classic vc_tta-shape-rounded vc_tta-o-shape-group vc_tta-controls-align-left vc_tta-o-all-clickable

div.p: At this time our daycare is running limited daycare service during the school closure – Only children ages 30 months to 10 years of age whose parents are First Responders, medical professionals and those people deemed essential and have to report to work will be allowed to attend. No drop ins will be allowed at this time. If you think you qualify please contact Lincoln office at 541-396-2811. We will be open normal hours. The daycare will be cleaned thoroughly each night. If your child is sick or showing signs of illness, please do not bring them to daycare. We will be forced to have you take them back home.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-flat vc_btn3-block vc_btn3-icon-left vc_btn3-color-green

div.a: Head Start Now Enrolling for the 2020/2021 school Year. Click or call 541-888-3717.

div.div: I invite you to stop by our district and take a look around. I believe you will find the Coquille School District an outstanding fit for your family’s needs.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid core-z-index vc_custom_1539369082817 vc_row-has-fill vc_row-no-padding vc_row-o-content-middle vc_row-flex

figure.figcaption: Courtesy of City of Coquille, All Rights Reserved.

p.span: Located in Southwestern Oregon 20 miles from the Oregon coast. The Coquille School District is comprised of four schools: Lincoln School of Early Learning, Coquille Valley Elementary, Coquille Jr/Sr High School, and Winter Lakes School. We encourage you to take a look around our website and visit each school’s webpage. Please don’t hesitate to contact us any time! We look forward to another great school year.

div.p: City of Coquille | Coquille Chamber of Commerce | South Coast ESD | Coos County | Coos Library | Oregon State Extension | SWOCC
